2.0.name: wordpress/nikeipod-stats
2.0.description:
A Wordpress plugin that displays your Nike + iPod stats.

The information is pulled from the nikeplus site without authentication, which means you dont have to provide your nikeplus password. I have not found any other widget to work that way.

It displays user profile (including your avatar, and totals), last 5 runs, and personal records

more details at http://blog.laurazavala.com
